entries.meaning: A boy or younger man in a homoerotic relationship with an older man. [1552]
examples: Synonyms: Ganymede, punk, gunsel; see also Thesaurus:male homosexual

verbs.description: catamite (third-person singular simple present catamites, present participle catamiting, simple past and past participle catamited)

entries.meaning: To engage in a homoerotic relationship involving a boy and an older man.
